name: Zero Deaths (atmosgames)
description:
On February 14th, I dared PewDiePie to dare me to make a game in 14 days. This is the result — a post-apocalyptic action-adventure about Felix's resurrection from the ashes of the Sub-Bot War of 2019.

Thank you so much Felix, my subscribers, Felix's subscribers, and the incredibly creative Reddit community for coming up with these amazing ideas! So much love. Oh, and thanks Kelsey for letting me work so late. I love you! 

- Thomas

Bug Reporting

Yo, this game was made in 14 days. I promise it's riddled with bugs. Please let me know in the community section below, and I'll get things patched up! Do not email me, just post them here. Love you mwuh.
